recipe.title: Lunch slice
recipe.ingredient: ( I put in 1/2 cup of three different types - chia/pumpkin/sun flour seeds, use what you like)
recipe.step: Grease lamington tray and place grease proof paper inside it and set aside. Preheat oven to 180C. In a bowl mix all dry ingredients with whisk then add all the wet ingredients. Stir till combined and carefully place in prepared pan. Flatten it down with wet hands. Cook for 30 mins or until slightly golden. Cool in tray and once completely cool cut in bars. Store in airtight container and take as a snack for lunches.
